description2: The Ultimate Webcam For Meeting Our best and most advanced business webcam is the Logitech Brio. Brio elevates the bar for super 4K HD video collaboration excellence with its revolutionary innovations. RightLight and high dynamic range (HDR) technology adjust automatically to help you seem professional in any lighting situation, including low light, direct sunlight, and high contrast lighting. Brio is certified for business and supports Windows Hello thanks to its integrated optical and infrared sensors. Best Of The Best Brio is an amazing piece of technology that transmits crystal-clear video with excellent resolution, frame rate, color, and clarity, as well as autofocus and a 5x HD zoom. Brio produces 4K Ultra HD video at 30 frames per second, HD 1080p video at 30 or 60 frames per second, and HD 720p video at 30, 60, or an ultra-smooth 90 frames per second for exceptional clarity, smoothness, and detail. Adjustable FOV To correctly frame your movie, choose from three fields of view (FOV) presets. Choose a diagonal of 65 degrees to frame a perfect head and shoulders view. Choose a diagonal angle of 78° or 90° to capture more of the room. Get a closer look with 5x HD zoom in stunning 4K resolution, regardless of the dFOV level you choose. Look Great In Light In any light, meet, stream, and record with Brio and always look your best. RightLight 3 and high dynamic range (HDR) technologies seamlessly adjust from low light to brilliant backlighting sunshine to always showcase the most important subject: you. Sound Professional In Any Environment Brio has two built-in omnidirectional microphones with noise-canceling technology. The mics record audio clearly from up to one meter away without boosting background noise, ensuring natural and clear interactions. Security Meets Convenience Brio provides rapid and safe facial recognition for Windows Hello, thanks to optical and infrared sensors. For Windows 10, there's no need to type a password; simply gaze into the Brio lens to log in. Smooth Streaming No Lag For high-quality recording, asynchronous presentation sharing with Teams, and smooth, fluid gaming broadcasts that keep up with your every move, Brio maintains a high frame rate (up to 90 fps) in every lighting condition. The higher frame rates are great for any situation that necessitates slow motion or a video stream that is extra-smooth and fluid. Take Control With Desktop On select models, including Brio, the Logi Tune Desktop app facilitates personal device control and customization. Zoom in/out, color presets, color tweaks, manual focus, and firmware upgrades are all available through the small app, which runs invisibly on your screen for uninterrupted video communication.

short_description: FLEXIBLE VIDEO FOR THE ANYWHERE WORKPLACE Simplify video conferencing so anyone can set it up and run a meeting anywhere. description2: Logitech Connect offers video conferencing that is simple to set up and affordable enough to be utilized in any meeting location, in addition to its award-winning design. With a wide 90° diagonal field-of-view, pan and tilt, 4x zoom, and razor-sharp optics, this video conferencing device is ideal for tabletop use and small spaces. Connect may be carried from meeting to meeting or packed while traveling to ensure that you never miss a chance to meet in person. It is small enough to fit on any countertop, measuring just 75 mm across. Even the handheld remote is engineered for mobility, with a lens cover that keeps it from being lost in your backpack. Logitech connect is certified for Skype for Business, Cisco JabberTM compatible, and enables increased integration with BlueJeans, Broadsoft, Life Size Cloud, Vidyo, and Zoom, and offers a plug-and-play USB connection to Windows and Mac® PCs and ChromebooksTM. Enjoy bright, clear video with correct color representation and crispness, even when zoomed in, thanks to the Logitech Connect's quality glass lens. By docking the magnetic remote control, the lens is readily protected from dust and scratches. The Logitech Connect sports a high-quality glass lens for maximum clarity. Enjoy bright, clear video with perfect color representation and sharpness even when zoomed in. You can simply protect the lens from dust and scratches by docking the magnetic remote control. Logitech Connect has an inbuilt, rechargeable battery that can operate video conversations for up to 3 hours and voice calls for up to 15 hours, making it ideal for travel. Starting an enterprise-quality videoconference has never been easier, with no specific software, training, or upkeep required. When plugged into your PC, Mac, or Chromebook, it works as a camera and an audio device with your video conferencing application. The Logitech Connect remote control is docked over the lens for enhanced privacy. When you want Connect to remain there, the Kensington security slot provides easy theft protection.

short_description: Premium PTZ camera with Ultra-HD imaging system and automatic camera control  RightSense™ technology automates a better user experience Advanced optics frame every participant with amazing clarity Sleek industrial design for any professional meeting space
price: Current Price: Rs.239,000, Original Price: Rs.
description2: PEERLESS PERFORMANCE Logitech Rally Camera is the top-of-the-line stand-alone video camera from Logitech®, with a premium industrial design and an Ultra-HD imaging system. Additionally, Rally Camera provides premium results in professional meeting spaces of all shapes and sizes. Thanks to its advanced lenses and innovative technologies. EXCEPTIONAL VERSATILITY With whisper-quiet mechanical Pan/Tilt/Zoom, razor-sharp 15X HD zoom, expansive 90° diagonal field of view, and powerful 4K sensor, Rally Camera captures every person in the room with the truly phenomenal video quality. STUDIO-QUALITY VIDEO With an Ultra-HD imaging system, Rally Camera delivers brilliantly sharp video, outstanding color, and exceptional optical accuracy at resolutions up to 4K. Furthermore, Logitech RightLight™ technology optimizes light balance to emphasize faces and render natural-looking skin tones, even in dim or backlit conditions. SLEEK INDUSTRIAL DESIGN Rally Camera incorporates world-class Logitech optics and 4K sensor in a premium industrial design suitable for any professional setting. Also, Elegantly finished in matte black with slate gray metal trim, the Logitech Rally Camera can be positioned on a table, mounted on a tripod, or secured to a wall with included hardware. SEE EVERYONE, PERFECTLY FRAMED Logitech RightSight™ camera control automatically moves and adjusts the lens to comfortably frame meeting participants. ENHANCED USER EXPERIENCE Rally Camera includes Logitech RightSenseTM, a collection of proactive technologies that automate a better user experience. Furthermore, RightSight™ automates camera control to perfectly frame participants, no matter their distance from the lens. In addition, RightLight™ optimizes light balance and priorities faces over objects and surfaces to render natural-looking skin tones. Plus, Rally Camera is compatible with virtually any video conferencing app right out of the box. PRIVACY ASSURANCE When the Logitech Rally Camera is not in use, the lens defaults to a parked position where the lens is pointed straight down. Moreover, this provides visual affirmation that the camera is unable to “see” anything in the meeting space when idle. The lens lifts to a preset position when joining a meeting and parks automatically when the meeting ends. In addition, whenever the video is on a mute during a meeting, a status light illuminates red to affirm visual privacy. AUTOMATIC CAMERA CONTROL Logitech RightSight camera control technology automatically moves and adjusts the lens to comfortably frame all the meeting participants. Enjoy hands-free convenience or take manual control: participants are always in view and optimally pictured on-screen. LIGHT/COLOUR OPTIMISATION Logitech RightLight technology with Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) prioritizes faces over objects and surfaces. In particular, it optimizes light balance and fine-tunes color and saturation for natural results across all skin tones. The result is a balanced image that renders participants in flattering light with reduced glare and softer shadows, even in dim or backlit conditions. ADAPTIVE PAN, TILT, AND ZOOM Whisper-quiet mechanical PTZ motor adjusts pan and tilt speed with the amount of zoom. As a result: Faster camera movement when zoomed out for quick framing and slower camera movement when zoomed in for more control. MULTIPLE INSTALLATION OPTIONS Position Rally Camera on a table, wall mount with included hardware, or attach to a VESA-compatible display with the optional TV Mount for MeetUp. For ceiling installations, Rally Camera detects when it’s inverted and automatically corrects the image orientation and camera controls. Rally Camera also includes a standard tripod thread for added flexibility. 4K RECORDING AND STREAMING Rally Camera captures up to 4K video at up to 30 frames per second, ideal for Ultra HD recording and streaming. Additionally, the advanced 4K imaging system delivers spectacular quality at all HD and Ultra HD resolutions. Also, the camera provides brilliantly sharp video, outstanding color reproduction, and exceptional optical accuracy. PLUG-AND-PLAY EASY Simply connect to power (regional plugs included) and to PC, Mac, and Chrome™ devices via USB. Rally Camera is UVC/plug-and-play compatible with virtually any video conferencing, recording, and broadcasting application that supports USB cameras.

short_description: SPEAK EASY with Full Duplex & Advanced Beamforming Front-of-room alignment of voice and video is just the first step to natural conversations. Right Sound™ technologies include a beamforming mic array that captures speech, while auto-leveling louder and softer voices and suppressing noise.
price: Current Price: Rs.170,900, Original Price: Rs.
description2: MeetUp uses RightSightTM computer vision to detect and frame individuals in the room, automatically adjusting camera position and zoom. Unlike speech tracking technologies that hop from person to person, RightSight frames everyone in the conversation, making it more comfortable and collaborative. Mounted at the display like a soundbar, MeetUp takes the speakerphone off the table to reduce cross-room cabling and maximize usable space. Get everything you need to build out small rooms for video meetings, including Logitech MeetUp, a mini PC or Chromebox™, room-optimized software, and the Logitech Tap touch controller. Perfectly frame presenters to minimize background distractions. Zoom in on whiteboards and objects so remote participants can see what you see. Thanks to its advanced 4K image sensor, video remains sharp and clear, even when you zoom in on the details. MeetUp features exquisitely engineered, premium camera optics that capture a wide field-of-view without distorting faces and furniture with a “fisheye” effect. Faces look natural, whiteboard writing remains legible, and straight lines stay straight. EXTENDED RANGE Logitech Expansion Mic for MeetUp provides greater flexibility in huddle room configurations. Meetup's built-in beamforming mics are optimized for up to 4 meters. To extend that range up to 5 meters, add an Expansion Mic. So whether people are seated at a table, sitting against the wall, or walking around the room, Expansion Mic for MeetUp means everyone will be heard. Already connected on your smartphone? Dialing into an audio conference? Pair MeetUp with your smartphone or tablet to enjoy outstanding audio clarity, volume, and range that handheld devices can't match. When you need to adjust the volume, mute the microphone, or take manual control over camera position, MeetUp's remote control uses radio frequency (RF) signals for reliable and discreet control from anywhere in the room. You can even download the free Logi Remote app (available on iTunes) to control MeetUp with an iPhone or iPad. Is there no need to drill? That's OK. The optional TV Mount for MeetUp allows you to put MeetUp above or below the display without drilling new holes by attaching to the VESA mounting points behind the display. Logitech RightSense™ proactive technologies make better video meetings easy and automatic. RightSound optimizes the human voice and enhances conversational clarity, RightSight automatically moves the camera and adjusts the zoom so no one gets left out of the picture, and RightLight helps everyone look their best on camera, regardless of lighting conditions.
